text: The Cleveland Barons were a professional ice hockey team in the National Hockey League (NHL) from 1976â€“78. They had been the California Golden Seals, which had played in Oakland since 1967. The franchise was then moved to Cleveland. After only two seasons, the team joined with the Minnesota North Stars. ==Related pages== Category:Defunct National Hockey League teams Category:Sports in Cleveland Category:1976 establishments in the United States Category:1978 disestablishments in the United States Category:1970s establishments in Ohio
title: Cleveland Barons (NHL)
